isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB DOOR ELECTRIC MIRROR SWITCH

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Electric Mirror Switch on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 96 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Connect wiring harness connector (Item 3) to the front cab door electric mirror switch (Item 1), driver side shown.

Once the wiring harness connector (Item 3) is connected to the front cab door electric mirror switch (Item 1), push wiring harness into opening in front cab door trim panel (Item 2), driver side shown.

With the wiring harness properly positioned inside front cab door trim panel (Item 2), position front cab door electric mirror switch (Item 1) into the opening of front cab door trim panel and push it down until the retaining tabs secure it in place, driver side shown.
